item.title: Official Miku Navi App Launched For Updates on News, Goods and Events
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Crypton Future Media has announced their very own app for sharing information on Hatsune Miku and other virtual singers, titled Miku Navi! Miku Navi is an app that keeps Miku followers updates on news, goods, event information and more. Users can also check-in at events (starting with Magical Mirai 2019) by scanning QR codes with …

The post Official Miku Navi App Launched For Updates on News, Goods and Events appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Crypton Future Media has announced their very own app for sharing information on Hatsune Miku and other virtual singers, titled Miku Navi! Miku Navi is an app that keeps Miku followers updates on news, goods, event information and more. Users can also check-in at events (starting with Magical Mirai 2019) by scanning QR codes with the app for a chance to get special gifts.

Miku Navi Official Site: https://mikunavi.com/index_en.html

Miku Navi is available for both iOS and Android platforms, and is available in Japanese, Chinese, and even English! The artwork and visuals for the app were drawn by Nokuhashi, which increases the app’s cuteness factor by x39. Grab the app and check it out for yourself!

> Download for iOS
> Download for Android

It looks like we’re getting even more competition. 頑張ります！

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Official Miku Navi App Launched For Updates on News, Goods and Events appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA & ONE x Simeji Collaboration Announced
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
IA & ONE fans rejoice! You can now customize your phone keyboard with the two, thanks to the IA & ONE x Simeji collaboration! About Simeji While the app itself isn’t well known in the west, its concept is something that everyone with a custom keyboard can understand. The app, like many, allow you to …

The post IA & ONE x Simeji Collaboration Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
IA & ONE fans rejoice! You can now customize your phone keyboard with the two, thanks to the IA & ONE x Simeji collaboration!

About Simeji

While the app itself isn’t well known in the west, its concept is something that everyone with a custom keyboard can understand. The app, like many, allow you to customize your smart phone’s keyboard with various character backgrounds as well as input emojis and more. However, it has something many keyboard apps don’t: VOCALOID themes! While this may not be a selling point for those outside of the fandom, it’s quite the advantage for those in it.

About the Collaboration

At the moment, there are two keyboards available for IA & ONE fans. However, Simeji also announced this as “For NicoNico Cho Kaigi” which is happening April 29th to April 30th in Japan. So there’s a chance we’ll receive even more during the event!

Until then, you can enjoy two commemorative keyboards made in celebration of the release of IA and ONE’s new CD/DVD “Reload & Into Starlight”

One features their original outfits while the other features the outfits they wore in the “Reload” video.

Where to Download

Simeji is available for both iOS and Android. While the app offers in-app purchases, it’s free to download and the IA & ONE themes are completely free!

iOS App Store
Google Play Store

The post IA & ONE x Simeji Collaboration Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Three New Heroes Debuting in #C.O.M.P.A.S.S.
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Since we last reported on #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. [COMbat Providence AnalysiS System], two brand-new playable Hero characters have been added to the smash hit mobile game, and a third one is about to make her debut! We know that you’re dying to find out more about them, so let’s get straight to it! Gustav Heydrich Voice Actor: …

The post Three New Heroes Debuting in #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Since we last reported on #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. [COMbat Providence AnalysiS System], two brand-new playable Hero characters have been added to the smash hit mobile game, and a third one is about to make her debut! We know that you’re dying to find out more about them, so let’s get straight to it!

Gustav Heydrich

Voice Actor: Kazuhiro Yamaji
Illustrator: Ryuusee
Profile: A ruthless war commander, clad from head to toe in biochemical weaponry. As an ally of Ouka Tadaomi, he seeks to unite the world under one banner.
“I will show you the true meaning of ‘darkness’ in this world…”
In Gameplay: Gustav is a tank Hero, and unlike other tanks, he moves very fast and is built for offense. Gustav also boasts the highest status out of all Heroes in the game in every category. The trade-off, however, is that he’s constantly sustaining damage while in battle, so players need to think about how to offset this with health-restoring cards.
Theme Song: “Grave” by niki

See Gustav in action below!

#コンパス 新ヒーロー
グスタフ【タンク】https://t.co/VigZFUGPdp
クリエイター(代表作)

絵師:りゅうせー(桜華忠臣)
声優:山路和弘(ジェイソン・ステイサム)
楽曲:nikiP(WAVE / ジッタードール)

実装→3月下旬メンテ後

かっこいい！ pic.twitter.com/eD7QdySvgL

— 太陽王ムハハーン (@TYOMHHN) March 22, 2017

Nikola Tesla

Voice Actor: Ayumu Murase
Illustrator: apapico
Profile: A young genius inventor brimming with curiosity. As the youngest of five siblings, he enjoys mischief-making.
“I just love the look of bewilderment on people’s faces! I wonder, what kind of face will you show me?”
In Gameplay: Tesla is a sprinter Hero who specializes in using the game’s trap cards; in his hands, a trap card’s effect lasts 5 seconds longer than it would if used by anyone else. Furthermore, whenever Tesla successfully captures a portal, he lays traps around it that will snare any opponents who get too close, subsequently filling his Hero Skill gauge.
Theme Song: “Tesla wa Yume no Naka” by TOKOTOKO

Here’s a video showing how Tesla plays in the game!

【新ヒーロー情報】
〜ニコラ テスラ〜
好奇心旺盛な 若き天才発明家
イタズラ大好きで 5人姉弟の末っ子

CV：村瀬歩
イラスト：apapico
ボカロP：TOKOTOKO

２８日メンテ後配信開始！#コンパス pic.twitter.com/KP4q8IcbJH

— 【公式】#コンパス 戦闘摂理解析システム (@cps_niconico) March 24, 2017

Hatsune Miku

Voice Actor: VOCALOID Hatsune Miku (Saki Fujita)
Illustrator: KEI
Profile: Our third new Hero has no profile, but she frankly doesn’t need one! That’s right, from April 27th through May 20th, Hatsune Miku herself will officially be a limited-time playable Hero in the world of #C.O.M.P.A.S.S.! In order to unlock her, players will have to earn (or buy with bitcoins) some in-game “collaboration gacha,” which will have double the chance of dropping during Miku’s availability period. For every 50 of these gacha that players earn, they will receive one “Hatsune Miku Hero Gacha Ticket,” which will unlock the digital diva for use in #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. matches!
In Gameplay: Miku will be a sprinter Hero with above-average attack power and stamina, but rather low defense. Her Hero Skill, “Starting My Solo Live♪,” and ability, “Healing Voice,” will greatly heal all nearby allies.
Theme Song: “Tell Your World” by kz

Throughout April 27th to May 20th, players will also have the chance to collect and use these limited-time, Miku-themed cards for their matches, each of which has its own special effect and strategy for use in a bout.

In addition to her familiar V2 outfit, Miku will also be getting alternate skins in the form of her V4 look, Append design, Sakura version, and even her Voidoll cosplay!

Don’t worry, Miku won’t be the only one getting in on the dress-up fun in #C.O.M.P.A.S.S.! With the collaboration announcement also came the new Miku-themed looks that all of the original 10 Hero characters in the game will be able to wear to battle!

Finally, you can check out some in-game footage of Miku in action here!

【初音ミク コラボ開催！】
スマホで対戦バトル「#コンパス」

▼今すぐDL▼https://t.co/kHtENP3E8v

新ヒーロー「初音ミク」登場！
UR２倍のコラボカードガチャ！
ログボやミッションもあるよ！

(＊) 4月27日(木)メンテ後から配信 pic.twitter.com/5Wv0nhmW1c

— 【公式】#コンパス 戦闘摂理解析システム (@cps_niconico) April 23, 2017

NHN Playart plans on making more announcements about Miku and beyond on their Niconico Cho Kaigi page on April 29th and 30th! VNN will be sure to keep you posted on any and all updates! Be sure to also check out our previous, in-depth report on #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. if this is your first time hearing about the game!

Official Links

Official #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Website
Twitter
Purchase on App Store
Purchase on Google Play
Famitsu App Collaboration Announcement Page

The post Three New Heroes Debuting in #C.O.M.P.A.S.S. appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Stream Anime and VOCALOID Music!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
On March 24th, a new platform was officially launched in Japan that will allow streaming of anime, video games, VOCALOID, and “tokusatsu” (sci-fi films or TV drama that uses special effects) music for the price of ¥600 JPY ($5 USD). The service is called ANiUTa and will be available on Google Play and iOS, having over 50,000 …

The post Stream Anime and VOCALOID Music! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On March 24th, a new platform was officially launched in Japan that will allow streaming of anime, video games, VOCALOID, and “tokusatsu” (sci-fi films or TV drama that uses special effects) music for the price of ¥600 JPY ($5 USD). The service is called ANiUTa and will be available on Google Play and iOS, having over 50,000 songs available for streaming from all major labels in Japan. It gets better, however, if you are still not convinced, it will also feature many exclusive content such as original TV content and voice actor collaborations! In addition to all this, around 20,000 of the 50,000 songs are available for the first time through streaming on ANiUTa!

Below are just some of the music you can expect to find.

Main Anime Music (starting with 50,000 tracks):

  • Attack on Titan
  • Ensemble Stars
  • Free!
  • Genesis of Aquarion
  • Girls und Panzer
  • K-On!
  • Kantai Collection
  • Kira Kira☆Pretty Cure A La Mode
  • Love Live!
  • Love Live! Sunshine!!
  • Lucky Star
  • Macross Delta
  • Macross Frontier
  • The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
  • Mr. Osomatsu
  • Re:Zero
  • Starting Life in Another World
  • Wake Up, Girls!
  • Yuri!!! on ICE

Don’t worry about selection! Whether you are into newer stuff or feel like taking a nostalgia trip down memory lane, the service will also offer older music from the record labels for everyone to enjoy. If you are tired of looking around for songs and having little to no luck finding what you want, then this service is for you!

Currently, the app is only available in Japan. However, it is planned to be released globally by the end of the year! Stayed tuned to VNN for the global release announcement.

Official Website (Japanese)

The post Stream Anime and VOCALOID Music! appeared first on VNN.
